actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Ohio River Corridor Study Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: Ohio River Corridor Study Commission Act of 1993

summary.text: Ohio River Corridor Study Commission Act of 1993 - Establishes the Ohio River Corridor Study Commission to study and report on: (1) the feasibility of establishing an Ohio River National Heritage Corridor for the Ohio River Corridor; and (2) the preservation, protection, improvement, enjoyment, and utilization of the historic, economic, natural, recreational, scenic, and cultural resources of the Corridor. Gives the consent and approval of the Congress to the States of Illinois, Kentucky, Indiana, Ohio, West Virginia, or Pennsylvania to enter into an interstate agreement or compact in furtherance of this Act or the study. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Ohio River Corridor Study Commission Act of 1993
A bill to provide for the establishment of the Ohio River Corridor Study Commission, and for other purposes.
